question: Pairs of nitrogenous bases are attached to each other by?

nodes.text: Potassium bonds attach pairs of nitrogenous bases to each other.
Ionic bonds attach pairs of nitrogenous bases to each other.
Magnetism is what pairs of nitrogenous bases are attached to each other by.
Hydrogen bonds attach pairs of nitrogenous bases to each other.
